scripts.clean: rm -rf allure-report allure-results test-results storageState.json playwright-report
scripts.test: npm run build && npx playwright test
scripts.test:dev: npm run clean && ENVIRONMENT=dev npm run test
scripts.test:stage: npm run clean && ENVIRONMENT=stage npm run test
scripts.test:report: npm run test && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
